description: These fragrant lemongrass scented pork lettuce cups make a tasty starter or light lunch.
name: Thai Style Pork Lettuce Cups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Separate the lettuce leaves by slicing off the root and arrange on a platter. Fill each lettuce cup with the pork mix, top with extra fresh mint, spring onion tops and chilli and serve.
